titleStmt.title: Lyman E. Munson to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1744

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New Haven, New Haven County, Connecticut

body.p:
New Haven Conn. Dec 14/63
To His Excellency
Gov Bramlett Frankfort K
Dr Sir
I am Commissioner of Deeds for most of the States of the Union & would like the appointment for your state if such appointment be consistent with your official duties
Any testimonials or fee necessary, will gladly furnish on intimation A Lewis Bishop having decd I believe there is no comr for your state residing in this city or vicinity
Hoping to receive such comn I am yours &c

Connecticut
Comr Deeds
L. E. Munson
apptd
8th Jany/63
